title: Riverdale
plot: After the death of one of the rich and popular Blossom twins on the 4th of July, the small town of Riverdale investigates the murder. The series starts in September, the beginning of a new school year, that brings with it new students, relationships, and reveals the mysteries of the past 4th of July.
stars: K.J. Apa, Lili Reinhart, Camila Mendes, Cole Sprouse
companies: Berlanti Productions, Archie Comics Publications, CBS Television Studios

trailer.title: Riverdale
trailer.videoDescription: While navigating the troubled waters of romance, school and family, Archie and his gang become entangled in dark Riverdale mysteries.

tagline: A Great Place to Get Away With It All
keywords: high school,mother daughter relationship,friendship,teen drama,school journalist

similars.title: The Vampire Diaries
similars.plot: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.
similars.stars: Nina Dobrev, Paul Wesley, Ian Somerhalder

similars.title: 13 Reasons Why
similars.plot: Follows teenager Clay Jensen, in his quest to uncover the story behind his classmate and crush, Hannah, and her decision to end her life.
similars.stars: Dylan Minnette, Katherine Langford, Christian Navarro

similars.title: Pretty Little Liars
similars.plot: Four friends band together against an anonymous foe who threatens to reveal their darkest secrets, while also investigating the disappearance of their best friend.
similars.stars: Troian Bellisario, Ashley Benson, Lucy Hale

similars.title: Elite
similars.plot: When three working-class teenagers begin attending an exclusive private school in Spain, the clash between them and the wealthy students leads to murder.
similars.stars: Miguel Bernardeau, Arón Piper, Itzan Escamilla

similars.title: Stranger Things
similars.plot: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.
similars.stars: Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Winona Ryder

similars.title: Gossip Girl
similars.plot: Privileged teens living on the Upper East Side of New York can hide no secret from the ruthless blogger who is always watching.
similars.stars: Blake Lively, Leighton Meester, Penn Badgley

similars.title: You
similars.plot: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.
similars.stars: Penn Badgley, Victoria Pedretti, Ambyr Childers

similars.title: Lucifer
similars.plot: Lucifer Morningstar has decided he's had enough of being the dutiful servant in Hell and decides to spend some time on Earth to better understand humanity. He settles in Los Angeles - the City of Angels.
similars.stars: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro

similars.title: Teen Wolf
similars.plot: An average high school student and his best friend get caught up in some trouble causing him to receive a werewolf bite. As a result they find themselves in the middle of all sorts of dramas in Beacon Hills.
similars.stars: Tyler Posey, Holland Roden, Dylan O'Brien

similars.title: Chilling Adventures of Sabrina
similars.plot: As her 16th birthday nears, Sabrina must choose between the witch world of her family and the human world of her friends. Based on the Archie comic.
similars.stars: Kiernan Shipka, Ross Lynch, Lucy Davis

similars.title: Riverdale
similars.plot: Canadian soap opera portrays the daily conflicts and drama among the lives and relationships of members of the Toronto community of Riverdale.
similars.stars: Richard Anselmo, Stewart Arnott, Tyrone Benskin

similars.title: Money Heist
similars.plot: An unusual group of robbers attempt to carry out the most perfect robbery in Spanish history - stealing 2.4 billion euros from the Royal Mint of Spain.
similars.stars: Úrsula Corberó, Álvaro Morte, Itziar Ituño
